key.name: length-cutoff
key.summary: Put window options in a submenu
key.description: If this many items or more are already in the appMenu, put the window options in a submenu. Set to -1 to ignore.

key.name: order
key.summary: Order of items in the menu.
key.description: Order of window options. You can put in: 'minimize', 'restore', 'maximize', 'move', 'resize', 'always-on-top', 'always-on-visible-workspace', 'move-to-workspace', 'move-to-next-workspace', 'move-to-previous-workspace', 'close-window', and 'separator' (for a separator).
